Package libraryapp

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorCompare
    Description: Author class (concrete class) to compare 2 books by author
    Book
    Description: class book
    BookCompare
    Description: Class father which start the inheritance to do generic comparitions
    GenreCompare
    Description: Genre class (concrete class) to compare 2 books by genre
    IsbnCompare
    Description: Isbn class (concrete class) to compare 2 books by ibsn
    LibraryApp
    Description: Main class which has the mainmethod and perform all the operations using the other classes
    Logic
    Description: this class contains the sort algorithms, binary search algorithm and method which are used by LibraryApp class
    Menu
    Description: interaction with the user
    Output
    Description: This class is responsible of print the results on the screen we use println function along with ANSI colour codes
    SetUp
    Class SetUp: Creation of the array Book with 500 elements.
    StringCompare
    Description: Abstract Class which extends BookCompare to implement the method string compare
    TitleCompare
    Description: Title class (concrete class) to compare 2 books by title
    YearCompare
    Description: Year class (concrete class) to compare 2 books by year
